Articles.Content:
Double "lower", triple "ower".

Lower Sunflower Tower
Suntower Flower

Project Archimedes Helios Tower

Spoiler

![FNV_screenshot_Helios_laser.jpg](https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/fallout/images/9/98/FNV_screenshot_Helios_laser.jpg)
Burnt Mountain.

I wet the mountain and it gets eroded back into a hill.

I then plant a flag on said hill. The <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> flag. My hill.

Wet hill.

Wethill.

Weθill
One Hill to rule them all.
This is not lord of the rings [@ColdJ](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/211123-coldj/). I sue you and win. My hill with all of coldj's stuff.

> 
> 
> 10 minutes ago, RedAl1en1 said:
> 
> 
> This is not lord of the rings [@ColdJ](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/211123-coldj/). I sue you and win. My hill with all of coldj's stuff.
> 

When you have played this thread for 3 years, you too will make it up as you go along. Ask Kerbiloid because they have been doing it for way longer than me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I counter Sue. She beats up the Judge and gets back all my stuff including my Castle with a moat.

I see

Well in that case i hire an assasin to kill you

MY HILL!

The assassin tried to kill me with a genetically modified poison, I become undead and bring an army of undead with me.

Hill of Bones.

I delete the letter “B” from existence, turning your undead army into several copies of the number one and take the hill.

Hill of Ones.

The hillofones are phoning.

Tardis.
Trenzalore
EXTERMINATE!!!!
Lunar terminator line

Moon Base,

(Space 1999)

i drop a neutron bomb and eradicate all life on the hill as well as the hill

**Edited <time datetime="2024-06-25T03:26:17Z" title="06/25/2024 03:26  AM" data-short="Jun 25">June 25</time> by KerbolRacer21**

As no one has stepped in to claim the lack of a hill, I do.

My nonexistent hill.

I use nanobots to rebuild the hill.

Nanopolis.

I hack all the nanobots and make them launch the hill into orbit, then make them build a base inside it.

My asteroid base.

The nanobots gain sentience and rebuild the asteroid into a Deathstar.

Nanobots Deathstar.

I send an X-Wing to blow up the Death Star.

Explosion.

When the smoke cleared, you can see the Death Star enlarged twice by the blowing.

~~X-Wing~~ Twitter-Wing launch clamp.
Humming Bird Hill
